In England, in the seven days to 24 April, there were 13,810 new confirmed cases (24.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 April, there were 13,614 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 1% (196 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 April is 3,856,836 (6,852.1 cases per 100,000 population).
